channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Airport Lounges Are Sexy Again—if You Can Get In
item.description: The latest wave of premium airport lounges are harder to get into, but for big-spending business travelers, no amenity is off the table.

item.title: Hacked, leaked, exposed: Why you should never use stalkerware apps
item.description: Using stalkerware is creepy, unethical, potentially illegal, and puts your data and that of your loved ones in danger.

item.title: Affluent Travelers Are Ditching Business Class for Business Jets
item.description: With a rise in “semiprivate” carriers, new booking tech, and commercial airline partnerships, it’s never been easier to fly private.

item.title: Data breach reveals Catwatchful ‘stalkerware’ is spying on thousands of phones
item.description: The spyware operation's exposed customer email addresses and passwords were shared with data breach notification service Have I Been Pwned.

item.title: Insurers Aren’t Saying Whether They’ll Cover Vaccines for Kids if Government Stops Recommending Them
item.description: RFK Jr.’s vaccine advisory board could stop recommending some routine childhood immunizations, leaving insurers to decide whether to still cover them....

item.title: Microsoft will lay off 9,000 employees, or less than 4% of the company
item.description: Microsoft is leveraging another round of layoffs despite posting consistent growth.

item.title: Rivian receives the next $1B from Volkswagen as sales struggles continue
item.description: Rivian sales ticked back up in Q2 but were down 23% from the same quarter last year. The company has been dealing with affordability issues made worse...

item.title: Tesla faces second straight year of falling sales after another bad quarter
item.description: Tesla sales fell more than 13% compared to last year as the company struggles to find demand for its aging lineup, and as CEO Elon Musk continues to d...

item.title: Jabra Enhance Select 50R Review: Palatable Price
item.description: These may be entry-level hearing aids, but they’re still serious contenders.

item.title: For Today's Business Traveler, It's All About Work-Life Integration
item.description: With hybrid lifestyles now the norm, business trips have become more intentional, more mobile, and surprisingly more restorative.
